name: Colorful未来
description:
Story:

Moving to a new city with a best friend and a heart full of hopes... This was the perfect scenario for the Heroine's new life.

She knew from the beginning that fighting for her dream wouldn't be easy, however she didn't back down. She was ready to save money, ready to face trouble with all the competition and even fight against possible enemies.For two years, she did it all, but then... one day, she woke up and the only thing she could do was stare at the ceiling.

She couldn't feel anything at all. She couldn't see the colors around, neither feel her heart beating.

"Why do I still try?"

"What's the reason for working so hard on this?"

"What I'm doing here?"

"I'm useless..."

After all this time fighting against the world, the true challenge was about to begin. She thought she was invincible until she finally had to face her own self.

This isn't just a love story, this is about finding your meanings and accepting who you are through the pain and love.

————
